name: Kingdom's Traitor
description:
One of a series of free original card games being released in conjunction with live event The Shield & Torch, all conceived as original card games typically played in the low-fantasy tavern. More information about The Shield & Torch is available here.

A game that mixes light storytelling with hidden traitors, Kingdom's Traitor casts the players as members of a royal court that must try to work together to solve the kingdom's problems - in spite of one amongst them trying to undo all their efforts.

Originating from the fictional world of Alongame - which has no monarchies, and so must rely only on second-hand understanding of such power structures and people - the game also has the added layer of pretending to be a royal court whilst having zero reasonable idea of what such a thing or its members looks like.
